column4: i'm downloading steam/counterstrike1.6 right now thru wine and i need to get verdanna arial and tahoma truetype fonts, where can i get these free?
a cd is supposed to hold 700 meg single layer dvd at 4.7 or so and I dont know about dbl layer
- so, like, if you want to burn a DVD and you are at best-buy, do you buy special DVD cds? is there a difference in the size allowed on the CD, or just in the files and way you burn to the CD?
cd and dvd are very different.  use the right one for each purpose, cd can be audio or data or bootable etc.
Are you doing if from livecd or from the install.  Dont try to move or resize a mounted partition
if you have an extended partition that complicates the issue
- i think i do. in noob speak... i think my sda3 contains sda3 (swap) and sda5 (main ubuntu space) as well as unallocated space . what should i do?
Pastebin your sudo fdisk -l   and provide a link please
to expand sda1 or 2 you will need to remove 345 etc
- so i have to delete all my linux partitions, resize vista, then reinstall ubuntu ?
you can trhow things onto a diff drive and move them back,
You may be able to umount 345 and try to shrink the ext3  sda3 etc, just not sure that will work right
fixing the mbr to get windows isnt hard, but reinstalling ubuntu / grub will fix that anyhow
